author: ASHRAF KHALIL and LOLITA C. BALDOR
title: National Guard to help DC control traffic for truck convoys
description: WASHINGTON (AP) — The Pentagon has approved the deployment of 700 unarmed National Guard troops to the nation’s capital as it prepares for trucker convoys that are planning protests against pandemic restrictions beginning next week.
